name: Control The Control
description:
Control The Control

-----==-----

You are at the hands of an all-seeing AI, but they have decided to let you tell them what to do. (They may be new to the job...)

Fill in the prompts with actions you can preform, then the AI will control the items in the level as told.

-----==-----

Controls

(A + D / Left Arrow + Right Arrow) -- Move

S / Down Arrow -- Crouch

W / Up Arrow / Space -- Jump

E -- Interact

Esc / P -- Pause

R -- Reset Room

Mouse -- Drag Commands

-----==-----
